article_title: What Catholics can teach America about polarized politics (COMMENTARY)
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

WASHINGTON (RNS) Compared with secular ideologies and other churches’ political pronouncements, Catholic social teaching offers the most comprehensively and authentically “Christian” ethic.

article_metadata.news_keywords: Culture, Politics, Catholic, Christian, Democrat, Evangelical, political polarization, Protestant, Republican
